1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: WN_ERROR.C Mon 11-06-2000 10:09:10 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #include <stdarg.h>
6    | #include "window.h"
7    | 
8    | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
9    |     FUNCTION: wn_error()
10   |      PURPOSE: Display an message in a window with 1 exit button
11   |       SYNTAX: void wn_error(char *format, ...);
12   |  DESCRIPTION: uses wn_dialog in the middle of the screen.
13   |      RETURNS: nothing
14   |      HISTORY: 910717 V0.1 - Initial version
15   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
16   | void wn_error(char *format, ...)
17   | {
18   |   va_list arguments;
19   |   static MENU menu[] = {{"OK"}};
20   |   int _tmp_att;
21   |   char s[132];
22   | 
23   |   wn_log("BEGIN WN_ERROR()\n");
24   |   wn_log_indent(+3);
25   | 
26   |   menu[0].flags |= EXIT;
27   | 
28   |   va_start(arguments,format);
29   |   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
30   |   va_end(arguments);
31   | 
32   |   _tmp_att = _dialog_att;
33   |   wn_dialog(13,40,1,menu,1,s);
34   |   _dialog_att = _tmp_att;
35   | 
36   |   wn_log_indent(-3);
37   |   wn_log("END WN_ERROR\n");
38   | }
